title: Pelé, Brazil’s mighty king of ‘beautiful game,’ has died

author: apollo1224
text: Dude you are a destiny support who believes some wild shit go get off Reddit and get help

author: FactAndLogic
text:
Wait, I watch a political streamer so I can't have an opinion on football?
I'm older than most of you and I follow football (and tons of other sports) all over the world, I watch 2-3 matches a day on average, and I'm 35 years old and have NEVER seen Pelé play, with the exception of a couple of clips. Very few people actually saw any of his games or clips, based on views on youtube clips when you search his name, so stop virtue signaling.

author: apollo1224
text: Definitely a destiny fan rights a whole essay when someone hurts their feelings

author: FactAndLogic
text:
You didn't hurt my feelings, I'm a bit more thick skinned than that mate.

I'm pointing to facts, while you're virtue signaling and throwing ad hom personal attacks.

I'm not a Destiny fan. I just watch some of his stuff. I disagree with him on most things.

text:
